name: Bloom (itch) (Galactic Games)
description:
Bloom is an interactive short game where your objective is to keep your flower blooming and defend it from bugs.

Bloom was made in under 3 days for the Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam, and was based around the theme "Keep it alive".

How to play:

Water your flower by dragging the watering can with your left-mouse button.

Squash bugs by left-clicking on them.

Use the Bug Spray by dragging with left-mouse button and then right-clicking.

Use the Wooden Trap by double-clicking in any spot to drop the trap.
